purpose: Curate and provide a comprehensive list of resources and tools related to Large Language Models (LLMs)
principle: Aggregates and organizes information about various LLM resources, including papers, models, datasets, and tools
reusability: Acts as a reference guide for researchers and developers interested in LLMs; can be easily linked or referenced in educational and research contexts
limitations: Primarily serves as a static resource list; does not provide dynamic content or real-time updates on LLM advancements
name: Awesome-LLM
description: Awesome-LLM: a curated list of Large Language Model
highlight: Extensive and curated compilation of resources related to Large Language Models
